【考法 1】 n. 诅咒：a ban or curse solemnly pronounced by ecclesiastical authority and accompanied by excommunication
【例】Naturally, these views are anathema to modern Austrians.
【近】curse, execration[,eksɪ'kreɪʃən], imprecation[,ɪmprɪ'keʃən], malediction[,mælɪ'dɪkʃ(ə)n]
【反】benediction, benison, blessing 祝福
【记】 ana-反 + the 神 + ma 音：骂→用神的话语来骂→神的诅咒
